column4: Question: Canuse the ubuntu logo on a web page without having legal troubles???
Question: Canuse the ubuntu logo on a web page without having legal troubles???
me Asks: Canuse the ubuntu logo on a web page without having legal troubles???

i think that the logo is actually owned by canonical or whatever it is called. I think they allow usage pretty liberally though if you email them. They let ubuntu christian edition use it so I don't know why they wouldn't let you use it on your webpage
right click the panel, add to panel, then find the notification area applet and add it
thanx a lot. (its the very first time that I see a tip like that work with only 1 try ;-) ) thanx
